prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: The Promptbook ecosystem includes the Book language, Promptbook Engine (for running Book applications), and Promptbook Studio (a web-based editor and runner for Book applications). It also has a community of developers and users, as well as branded social media presence.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}
